extract_genus()

Source: R/select_traits_tax_dist.R
extract_genus.Rd

If a binomial taxa is supplied, extract the genus name only

Usage

extract_genus(binomial)

Arguments

binomial

  • binomial character string separated by a space (e.g. "Loxodonta loxodonta")

Value

string with the genus name

Details

This method works exclusively with genera and not species. This is because once the genus is known, the relationship among the species within that genus is known. It makes the method much more computationally efficient. This function is used to then extract the genus from a species name. The genus name is used to place the species in the correct taxonomic framework

Author

James G. Hagan (james_hagan(at)outlook.com)
